name: Moh Alef Farhandiansyah - Student majoring in Electronics Engineering
description: A highly motivated and detail-oriented Electronics Engineering fresh graduate with a solid foundation in circuit design, embedded systems, and industrial automation. Experienced in maintenance and troubleshooting through an internship as a Maintenance Technician at PT Sukses Cemerlang Indoraya. Possesses strong analytical skills, a proactive attitude, and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively. Eager to apply academic knowledge and hands-on experience to contribute to innovative engineering solutions in a dynamic work environment.
